title: Upgrade EpixChain to v0.5.1
summary:
This upgrade migrates EpixChain to v0.5.1.

Key changes:
- Enhanced denom metadata for aepix/epix tokens
- Improved EVM configuration handling
- Updated function signatures for better compatibility

Release: https://github.com/EpixZone/EpixChain/releases/tag/v0.5.1

Binary verification:
- Build from source: `git checkout v0.5.1 && make install`
- Verify version: `epixd version` should show `v0.5.1`
